testCase.requirementText: Size of the linked file in bytes.
testCase.description:
Size of the linked file in bytes - dmdSec/mdRef/@SIZE It has cardinality '1..1' and level 'MUST' in CSIP. It is optional according to its XML Schema.
Rule needed for the existence of the attribute SIZE for element dmdSec/mdRef. ERROR if it does not exists. Ensure test set contains inconsistent sizes, i.e. stated size and actual file size differ.

rule.description: dmdSec/mdRef/@SIZE is a mandatory attribute if dmdSec/mdRef exist

error.message: There is a dmdSec/mdRef element in METS.xml but no @SIZE-attribute. There must be a @SIZE-attribute
